The subject matter, content and form of this work are all virtual creations. Any similarity is purely coincidental. The fictional pornographic content in the content is only for leisure and entertainment purposes. Please do not imitate
All characters in the game are over 18 years old. You must be over 18 years old to play the game[/b]

※All characters involved in sexual content are over 18 years old. You must be over 18 You can enter the game only if you are one year old

Game Introduction

My neighbor Heiman looks sweet and quiet, but she is a different person when she goes to bed...
At the first party, Heiman took advantage of my drunkenness and quietly and wantonly invaded my mouth, almost forcibly throwing me down... In this way, I lived a sweet and shameless life with her!

"Lick me clean"
Alas... In this case, why not enjoy it

Gameplay

In the game, you need to find two cards with exactly the same picture by clicking on the cards to flip them. If the pictures are the same, it is a success and the two cards will be eliminated; if the turned cards are inconsistent, the game will not change. When all the cards on the picture are eliminated, you can enter the next level. As the game progresses, unlock the sweet interaction with your fantasy girlfriend, explore her secrets, and go on a wonderful date with her...

Any similarities are purely coincidental, and the fictional fantasy content contained in the content is for entertainment only.
All characters in this game are over 18 years old.

Minimum:

short_description: In the game, you need to click on the cards to flip them and find two cards with the same picture. If the pictures are the same, it is a success and the two cards will be eliminated; if the cards turned out are different, the game will not change.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
